text: David Anthony Jerome Holford (16 April 1940 â€“ 30 May 2022), was a West Indies cricketer who played 24 test matches scoring 768 runs and one test century. He was the cousin of the cricketing legend Garfield Sobers. ==Other websites== * Category:1940 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Barbadian cricketers
